• Platform

    OVERVIEW

    • Enterprise TruRisk Platform

    Everything you need to measure, manage, and reduce your cyber risk in one place

    CAPABILITIES

    • All
    • Asset Management
    • Vulnerability & Configuration Management
    • Risk Remediation
    • Threat Detection & Response
    • Compliance
    • Cloud Security

    PLATFORM APPS

      ASSET MANAGEMENT

    • CyberSecurity Asset Management (CSAM)

      See entire attack surface, continuously maintain your CMDB, and track EOL/EOS software

    • External Attack Surface Management (EASM) - New

      Gain an attacker’s view of your external internet-facing assets and unauthorized software

      • Vulnerability & Configuration Management

    • Vulnerability Management, Detection & Response (VMDR) - Most Popular

      Discover, assess, prioritize, and patch critical vulnerabilities up to 50% faster

    • Enterprise TruRisk Management (ETM) - New

      Consolidate & translate security & vulnerability findings from 3rd party tools

    • Web App Scanning (WAS)

      Automate scanning in CI/CD environments with shift left DAST testing

    • Cloud Workload Protection (CWP)

      Detect, prioritize, and remediate vulnerabilities in your cloud environment

      • Risk REMEDIATION

    • Patch Management (PM)

      Efficiently remediate vulnerabilities and patch systems

    • Custom Assessment and Remediation (CAR)

      Quickly create custom scripts and controls for faster, more automated remediation

      • Threat Detection and Response

    • Multi-Vector EDR

      Advanced endpoint threat protection, improved threat context, and alert prioritization

    • Context XDR

      Extend detection and response beyond the endpoint to the enterprise

      • Compliance

    • Policy Compliance

      Reduce risk, and comply with internal policies and external regulations with ease

    • File Integrity Monitoring (FIM)

      Reduce alert noise and safeguard files from nefarious actors and cyber threats

      • Cloud Security

    • TotalCloud (CNAPP)

      Cloud-Native Application Protection Platform (CNAPP) for multi-cloud environment.

    • Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM)

      Continuously discover, monitor, and analyze your cloud assets for misconfigurations and non-standard deployments.

    • Infrastructure as Code Security (IaC)

      Detect and remediate security issues within IaC templates

    • SaaS Security Posture Management (SSPM) - New

      Manage your security posture and risk across your entire SaaS application stack

    • Cloud Workload Protection (CWP)

      Detect, prioritize, and remediate vulnerabilities in your cloud environment

    • Cloud Detection and Response (CDR)

      Continuous real-time protection of the multi-cloud environment against active exploitation, malware, and unknown threats.

    • Container Security (CS)

      Discover, track, and continuously secure containers – from build to runtime

Qualys Certification and Training Center

Welcome to the Qualys Certification and Training Center where you can take free training courses with up-to-date hands-on labs featuring the latest Qualys Suite features and best practices. Available self-paced, in-person and online

Free Training login | Create an account
  • Certified Courses
  • Video Libraries
  • Instructor-Led Training
  • Onboarding Training

Take free self-paced or instructor-led certified training on core Qualys topics, and get certified.

Get Started: Video overview

Vulnerability Management Learning Path:

Vulnerability Management Foundation (optional) Understand the basics of Vulnerability Management.
VMDR with TruRisk An introduction to core Qualys sensors and core VMDR functionality.
CyberSecurity Asset Management (CSAM) Learn to organize and manage data in a better way using various features of the CSAM application.
Scanning Strategies Scan a complex network of devices.
Reporting Strategies Build a reporting program that impacts security decisions.
Patch Management Accelerate vulnerability remediation for all your IT assets.

Policy Compliance Learning Path:

Policy Compliance Foundation (optional) Understand the basics of Policy Compliance.
Policy Compliance Learn how to verify the baseline configuration of your host assets.

PCI Compliance Learning Path:

PCI Compliance Foundation (optional) Understand the basics of PCI Compliance.
PCI Compliance See how to scan your assets for PCI Compliance.

Endpoint Detection and Response Learning Path:

Endpoint Detection and Response Foundation (optional) Understand the basics of EDR and endpoint security.
Endpoint Detection and Response Learn how to secure endpoints and hunt for malware with Qualys EDR.

Foundational courses:

Endpoint Detection and Response Foundation Understand the basics of EDR and endpoint security.
Vulnerability Management Foundation Understand the basics of Vulnerability Management.
Policy Compliance Foundation Understand the basics of Policy Compliance.
PCI Compliance Foundation Understand the basics of PCI Compliance.

Additional certified courses:

Administration Learn about subscription administration and using the Qualys Administration Utility.
Qualys Flow (QFlow) Learn how to automate detection & remediation with no-code Workflows with Qualys Flow (QFlow).
Custom Assessment and Remediation (CAR) Learn to create reusable custom detections and remediations, including deploying custom configurations and applications.
Endpoint Detection and Response Learn how to secure endpoints and hunt for malware with Qualys EDR.
Qualys Query Language (QQL) Learn the basics of Qualys Query Language in this course. You will use Qualys Query Language (QQL) for building search queries to fetch information from Qualys databases.
API Fundamentals Learn the basics of the Qualys API in Vulnerability Management.
Cloud Agent Learn how to configure and deploy Cloud Agents.
Container Security Learn the core features of Qualys Container Security and best practices to secure containers.
File Integrity Monitoring Log and track file changes across your global IT systems.
PCI Compliance See how to scan your assets for PCI Compliance.
Web Application Scanning Learn the core features of Qualys Web Application Scanning.

Watch individual videos to learn specific skills and techniques with Qualys.

Asset Inventory & IT Security:

How-To: VMDR Walk through the steps for setting up VMDR.
Qualys Subscription Health Learn how to manage your Qualys subscription health
How-To: Administration Walk through the steps for using the Administration Utility to allow access and distribute responsibilities in a subscription.
Administration Learn how to use the Qualys Administration Utility.
CSAM Training View CSAM training videos a la carte.
How-To: CSAM Get full visibility into your asset inventory.
CSAM: See your attack surface like an attacker would This video series helps you identify security gaps and respond to them. Protect your online assets and cybersecurity posture with EASM by identifying them before hackers do.
External Attack Surface Management - Onboarding Quickly discover all external-facing assets, set up continuous monitoring, and lower your organization's cyber risk.
Network Passive Sensor Automatically detect and profile all network-connected systems, eliminating blind spots across your IT environment.
Qualys Scanner Appliance This video series focuses on Qualys Scanner Appliance deployment and troubleshooting.
VMDR with TruRisk Get started with the basics of Vulnerability Management. Learn how to organize assets, scan for vulnerabilities, prioritize remediation, and create effective reports and dashboards.
How-To: Scanning Walk through the steps for setting up a vulnerability scanning strategy for a large organization.
Vulnerability Management Use Cases Expand your knowledge of vulnerability management with these use cases.
Scanning Strategies Dive into the vulnerability scanning process and strategy within an enterprise.
Troubleshooting Scanner Appliance Understand error codes when deploying a scanner appliance.
Reporting Strategies Dive into the vulnerability reporting process and strategy within an enterprise.
Vulnerability Management Purging See how to purge vulnerability data from stale assets.
Continuous Monitoring Get alerts in real time about network irregularities.
Qualys Query Language Build search queries in the UI to fetch data from your subscription.
Qualys API Fundamentals Learn the basics of the Qualys API.
Widget Tutorials See how to create customized widgets using pie, bar, table, and count.
Consulting Edition The Qualys Cloud Platform packaged for consultants, consulting firms and MSPs.
Certificate View Get an inventory of your certificates, configure as per best practices, and assess them for vulnerabilities
Patch Management Accelerate vulnerability remediation for all your global IT assets
How-to: Custom Assessment and Remediation (CAR) Walk through the steps to create reusable custom detections and remediations.
Patch Management - Onboarding Quickly reduce risk and set up automated jobs with Patch Management.
How-to: EDR Walk through the steps for configuring Qualys EDR.
How-To: XDR Walk through the steps for setting up and configuring XDR.
Custom Assessment and Remediation (CAR) Learn to create reusable custom detections and remediations, including deploying custom configurations and applications.

Cloud and Container Security:

AWS EC2 A full video series on Vulnerability Management in AWS.
Cloud Agent Learn how to configure and deploy Cloud Agents.
AWS Golden AMI Pipeline Learn how to implement Qualys scanning of instances in an AWS golden AMI pipeline.
How To: Cloud Agent Walk through the steps to configure and deploy Cloud Agent.
QGS Training Get an overview of Qualys Gateway Server
How-to: TotalCloud This video series will walk you through the steps for setting up the Qualys TotalCloud application.
TotalCloud Get visibility into your comprehensive security for your multi-cloud environment.
Qualys Flow (QFlow) Automate Detection & Remediation with No-code Workflows
Container Security Deployment Deployment and configuration of Qualys Container Security in various environments.
How To: Container Security Walk through the steps to deploy Container Sensor and understand its use cases. 
Container Security Learn the core features of Qualys Container Security and best practices to secure containers.
Microsoft Azure Learn how to integrate Qualys with Azure.

Web Application Security:

Web Application Firewall Learn best practices to protect your web application from attacks.
Web Application Scanning Learn the core features of Qualys Web Application Scanning.
How-to: WAS Walk through the steps to configure and scan web apps and report web app vulnerabilities.

Compliance:

File Integrity Monitoring Log and track file changes across your global IT systems.
Policy Compliance Learn how to verify the baseline configuration of your host assets.
Advanced Policy Compliance Expand your knowledge of UDCs and policies in Qualys Policy Compliance.
PCI Compliance See how to scan your assets for PCI Compliance.
Security Assessment Questionnaire Learn how to use templates, either your own or from the template library.

Onboarding Training is designed to get new customers moving as quickly as possible. It is not a certified training. If you just purchased VMDR, this is where you should start.

Onboarding Training for External Attack Surface Management This is the fastest way to get started with EASM.
Onboarding Training for TotalCloud This is the fastest way to get started with TotalCloud.
Onboarding Training for VMDR This is the fastest way to get started with VMDR.
Onboarding Training for Patch Management This is the fastest way to get started with Patch Management.

Is your web server's SSL/TLS configuration secure? Find out for free.

See the power of Qualys, instantly. We don’t use the domain names or the test results, and we never will.
